casebody.data:
Edward J. EVANS, Appellee, v. PANAMA RAILROAD COMPANY, Appellant. No. 420. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. June 6, 1932. Eichard Beid Eogers, of New York City, for appellant. Paul C. Matthews, of New York City (William S. Butler, of Brooklyn, N. Y., and Baymond Parmer, of New York City, of counsel), for appellee.

Before L. HAND, AUGUSTUS N. HAND, and CHASE, Circuit Judges.

PEE CUEIAM.

Judgment affirmed.
